title: EP 129: The Life & Death of Alpo, Cowardly Cops & A** Whoopins
itunes:title: EP 129: The Life & Death of Alpo, Cowardly Cops & A** Whoopins
description:
We discuss the life and death of Alpo, The punk a** law enforcement office who stomped a mentally disabled man in Indiana, old school a** whooping's and the homie Reggie Wright Jr. checks in (talking sh*t as usual) It's one of those episodes. Have a great day and stay sucka free!


Checkout our new site www.thissomebull.com This is where you can see our full episodes, plus exclusive ish

Follow us on Instagram www.instagram.com/thegangsterchroniclespodcast
